name: deepexi-scaffold-ui
description: DeepEXI 脚手架 UI 可视化操作界面

scripts.start: cd back && npm run start && cd ../
scripts.stop: cd back && npm run stop && cd ../
scripts.dev: cd back && npm run dev && cd ../
scripts.test: cd back && npm run test && cd ../
scripts.buildfronted: cd fronted && rm -rf ../back/app/public && npm i && npm run build && cd ../

author: lyTongXue
